Reviews.Title: “We'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: Dawn308
Reviews.Content: daughter stayed 1st napa valley triathlon clean parking ample spapool inviting recovering triathlon friendly staff supplied breakfast location view speak variety restaurants close perfect gateway location lake south smooth check inout definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Prayl
Reviews.Content: stayed based price honestly little worried disappointed based reviews loved everyday day stay staff attentive friendly helpful moment walked door clean spacious busy days wine tasting breakfast day consisted eggs potatoes sausage bacon yogurt bagels toast etc exactly youd expect free hotel breakfast found hot plentiful location business mile downtown napa nice 15 minute 600 cab ride street couple diners grocery wine nice deli everyday arrived proprty inour commented agree stay definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Best for the Price!”
Reviews.Author: TightTraveler
Reviews.Content: arrived roomy studio king bed sofa mini fridge microwave impeccably clean suited yes school crt television yes decor bit dated 8 10 yes location auto dealers section town pay accommodations heres else youll finda clean kept indoor pool spa hot breakfast sausage links bacon scrambled eggs hashbrowns pleasant helpful staff nicely landscaped flower beds surrounding property couldnt happier unless willing fork hundred dollars

Reviews.Title: “Great Base Point”
Reviews.Author: cardinaljumps
Reviews.Content: spent nights wine tasting site seeing napa valley sonoma country doing counties exterior entrances ok breakfast alright bit crowded times dinning evenings enjoyed clean nice pool

Reviews.Title: “great central location”
Reviews.Author: travelmom1369
Reviews.Content: daughter pleasantly surprised nice hotel base site visiting napa sonoma wineries sites king size bed sitting tv microwave frig 2 vanity indoor pool jacuzzi 3 story ceiling price included breakfast friday morning eggs bacon hash browns usual continental items sat morn eggs sausage waffles fri breakfast definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Above average place to stay”
Reviews.Author: vinominnesota
Reviews.Content: affordable nice stay couple nights wine country located noisy street street noise issue walls fairly thin hear people talking free breakfast plus baked eggs bacon sausage cereals yogurt fruit juices coffee pool looked nice time slight complaint mild mold mildew smell bathroom moved staff friendly helpful decided

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: judahvista
Reviews.Content: stayed night week day wine tasting booked online 101 total hotel motel busy street street noise minimal especially youre building parking easy easy access stores including target front desk helpful wifi clean plenty lighting packets toothpaste im sorry indoor pool looked inviting issue seating breakfast food run quickly especially bacon food replaced quickly eventually grab coffee checking noticed left food running food issue food cooked fast overall enjoyed stay value

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Jim N
Reviews.Content: warm greeting staff start stay convienient downtown napa spacious comfortable clean hot breakfast morning plus highly recomend staying heartfelt thankyou staff stay

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY HERE! THIS IS NOT 3 STAR HOTEL - IT'S A MOTEL 6‎”

Reviews.Content: staying 34 star hotels avoid plague motel6 fixed nicer furniture staff care totally rude travel napa stay bed comfortable location pretty convenient bad creeking type noises ceiling floor 105 stopped night kept front desk approached basically bad sad night napa tired ruined day 2 napa threw enitre trip bad start

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel - Would be perfect if closer to town”
Reviews.Author: Spanner101
Reviews.Content: hawthorn suites nice hotel staff helpful advice prepared bookings free wine tasting vouchers fun negative hotel mile town takes 2030 minutes walk nicest roads recomend getting taxi hotel

Reviews.Title: “Motel that's much better than the average motel”
Reviews.Author: jrw88888
Reviews.Content: stayed hawthorn suites saturday night near downtown napa trying book night 400 travelodge decided wing day hawthorn 200 er bargain welcome napa pleasantly surprised staff breakfast eggs potatoes sausage usual etc spacious clean bed comfortable pool indoors maybe towels doorswindows bit road noise noticed opposed actually irritated elm house inn didnt book time bad fallback

Reviews.Title: “Location is the only negative”
Reviews.Author: shario
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights recently usually stay nicer napa season summer rates expensive decided hawthorn inn try initially pretty distressed neighborhood industrial remembered mainly car dealerships auto stores wishing sprung nicer hotel checked fine front desk staff extremely nice eager help larger average hotel include microwave minirefrigerator handy five minute drive center napa concern didnt drive drinking walking distance aside taco trucks diner eat husband limit glass wine dinner drink lot issue unless designated driver cabs free breakfast nice touch saved money isnt ideal choice stay hawthorn inn summer hotel rates definitely worth staying please dont excited gym consists machines day pass gym napa hotel help

Reviews.Title: “A nice palce to stay at reasonable rates”

Reviews.Content: stayed nights traveled attend family function buy car family live ca neat beds pillows towels toiletries enjoyed hot breakfast staff nice customer friendly luckily found honda dealer door bought honda car visited shops guy deal cons view building steps outside feel comfortable night highway front hotel hear traffic noise

Reviews.Content: swimming pool disgusting floating hair dirt collected looked oil slick bottom pool brown dirt collected bottom weekend middle day appear pump 20000 night clean pool afraid swim towels worn sand paper left 1 towel guest stay dump

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”

Reviews.Content: impressed hotel location downtown napa minutes tour winerys napa valley hotel value breakfast morning am talking breakfast eggs meat hashbrowns etc everyday service doubt front desk staff helped everyday day events helped print maps plenty advise justine michael helping appreciated nashville tn holt family

Reviews.Title: “Good Value, Great Service, more money for wine”

Reviews.Content: company event carneros inn 3x price hawthorne inn marriott westin 2x hawthorne inn clean staff internet free breakfast hbo walk downtown napa whats owner ride struggling cab couple miles id stay heart beat buy 3 bottles wine money save
